Metadata.title: Custom Canvas Prints & Framing | Canvas Print Shop
Metadata.description: Transform your photos into high-quality canvas prints with our easy upload service and optional framing. Expert craftsmanship, made in Canada. Order now for fast delivery!

og.title: Custom Canvas Prints & Framing | Canvas Print Shop
og.description: Transform your photos into high-quality canvas prints with our easy upload service and optional framing. Expert craftsmanship, made in Canada.

hero.title: Custom Canvas Prints Made to Order
hero.description: Turn your cherished memories into beautiful canvas prints, expertly hand-crafted in Canada and ready to hang in your home.

premium.title: Premium Materials
premium.description: Premium cotton-blend canvas with 10x higher density and 75% opacity - far superior to competitors' lower quality materials.

craftsmanship.title: Expert Craftsmanship
craftsmanship.description: All canvas prints are expertly handcrafted in our Canadian studio, based in Quebec City.

process.title: Easy Process
process.description: Simply upload your image, choose your dimensions, preview your canvas print and then checkout.

technology.title: UVgel Technology
technology.description: Advanced Canon printing technology delivering exceptional color vibrancy and durability, backed by our 30-year print quality guarantee. Eco-friendly, no-odor prints perfect for indoor display.

featured.heading: Create Your Custom Canvas Print
featured.description: Transform your favorite moments into stunning wall art with our premium canvas prints

upload.title: Upload Your Photo
upload.description: Choose your favorite image from any device

select.title: Select Your Style
select.description: Pick your size and frame options

first.quote: The quality exceeded my expectations. The colors are vibrant, and the framing is absolutely perfect.
first.author: Jennifer T., Toronto

second.quote: From upload to delivery, the whole process was seamless. The finished piece looks amazing!
second.author: Michel B., Montreal

Footer.companyDescription: Creating beautiful, high-quality canvas prints for your home or office. Proudly Canadian, serving customers nationwide.

metadata.title: Shipping Policy | Canvas Print Shop
metadata.description: Learn about our shipping options including Canada Post delivery and local pickup in Quebec City.

localPickup.title: Local Pickup
localPickup.description: We offer free local pickup at our Quebec City location for your convenience.
localPickup.hours: Available during business hours: Monday to Friday, 9am - 5pm EST
localPickup.email: You'll receive an email when your order is ready for pickup

canadaPost.title: Canada Post Delivery
canadaPost.description: We ship all orders through Canada Post with tracking provided on every shipment.
canadaPost.disclaimer: *Delivery times are estimates and may vary based on weather conditions and Canada Post service updates.

processingTime.title: Processing Time
processingTime.description: Each canvas print is carefully crafted to order:
processingTime.standard: Standard orders: 2-3 business days processing time
processingTime.payment: Processing begins once payment is confirmed
processingTime.tracking: You'll receive an email with tracking information once your order ships
processingTime.rush: Rush processing may be available upon request

shippingCosts.title: Shipping Costs
shippingCosts.standard: Standard Shipping: Calculated at checkout based on size and destination
shippingCosts.free: Free shipping on orders over $150 (some remote locations excluded)

orderTracking.title: Order Tracking
orderTracking.description: Stay informed about your order status:
orderTracking.number: Tracking number provided via email once order ships
orderTracking.website: Track your package directly through Canada Post's website
orderTracking.notifications: Email notifications for order confirmation, processing, and shipping
orderTracking.support: Contact our customer service team for additional tracking support

metadata.title: Returns Policy | Canvas Print Shop
metadata.description: Learn about our 30-day return policy and our commitment to customer satisfaction. We make returns easy with our hassle-free process.

ReturnsPolicy.introduction: At Canvas Print Shop, we take pride in delivering exceptional quality canvas prints. Your satisfaction is our top priority, which is why we offer a comprehensive 30-day return policy. We stand behind our products and will work with you to ensure you're completely happy with your purchase.

returnWindow.title: 30-Day Return Window
returnWindow.description: You can initiate a return within 30 days of receiving your order if you're not completely satisfied. This applies to:

reasons.expectations: Items that don't meet your expectations

returnProcess.title: How to Return Your Order
returnProcess.description: Starting a return is simple. Email us at returns@canvasprintshop.ca with:

requirements.orderInfo: Your order number and email address used for the purchase
requirements.photos: Photos of the item (required for quality issues or damage)
requirements.preference: Your preference for a replacement or refund

returnProcess.response: Our customer service team will respond within one business day with detailed return instructions.

guarantee.title: Our Quality Guarantee
guarantee.description: We stand behind the quality of our products:

benefits.replacements: Free replacements for any quality issues
benefits.refunds: Full refunds available if we can't meet your satisfaction
benefits.shipping: No return shipping costs for defective or incorrect items
benefits.support: Dedicated support throughout the return process

refundProcess.title: Refund Information
refundProcess.timeline: Refunds are processed within 3-5 business days of receiving the return
refundProcess.method: Refunds are issued to the original payment method
refundProcess.confirmation: You'll receive an email confirmation when your refund is processed
refundProcess.bankProcessing: Bank processing times may vary for the refund to appear in your account

exceptions.title: Return Exceptions
exceptions.description: Please note that some items may not be eligible for return:

items.customSizes: Custom-sized prints outside our standard dimensions
items.misuse: Items damaged due to misuse or improper handling

metadata.description: Search for products in the store.

metadata.title: Canvas Making Process | Canvas Print Shop
metadata.description: Learn about our premium canvas production process - from material selection to quality control, see how we craft our high-quality canvas prints.

hero.title: How We Make Our Canvases
hero.description: Discover the craftsmanship and attention to detail that goes into every canvas we produce.

materials.title: Selecting Premium Materials
materials.description: We start with carefully selected, high-grade cotton blend canvas. Each roll is inspected for quality and consistency, ensuring that only the finest materials make it to our production floor. Our canvas has an opacity of up to 75%, over 7x higher than Best Canvas.

printing.title: High Quality Printing Process
printing.description: We utilise advanced Canon printing technology to deliver exceptional colour vibrancy and durability. After printing your image using UVgel ink, the print undergoes UV LED curing. The result? A durable, flexible finish that needs no further protection. It's so durable, our canvases are backed by our 30-year print quality guarantee!

frame.title: Custom Stretcher Frame Assembly
frame.description: Our skilled craftsmen construct sturdy stretcher frames from premium wood, precisely cut and joined to create the foundation of your canvas. Each corner is reinforced for lasting durability.

stretching.title: Professional Stretching Process
stretching.description: Using specialised equipment and techniques, we stretch the canvas over the frame with perfect tension. This critical step ensures your canvas will maintain its shape and stability over time.

quality.title: Quality Control
quality.description: Every canvas undergoes rigorous quality checks throughout the production process. We examine tension, corner folds, and overall construction to ensure each piece meets our exacting standards.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Our Quality?
cta.description: Each canvas is crafted with care and backed by our satisfaction guarantee.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Canvas Print Shop ('we', 'our', 'us') respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information...

informationWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content: We collect information that you voluntarily provide to us when you create an account, upload images, contact us, or subscribe to our newsletter...

howWeUseInformation.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUseInformation.content: We use your information to process orders, provide support, send marketing messages, and improve our services...

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share it with service providers, legal advisors, or authorities when required...

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement encryption, secure payment processing, and other measures to protect your data...

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your data and withdraw consent for marketing communications...

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.content: We use cookies to improve user experience and analyze traffic. You can disable cookies in your browser settings...

changesToPolicy.title: Changes to This Policy
changesToPolicy.content: We may update this privacy policy. We will notify you by updating the 'Last updated' date...

questions.title: Questions?
questions.content: If you have any questions about our privacy policy, please contact us:

metadata.title: Contact us | Canvas Print Shop
metadata.description: We're here to help! Choose the best way to reach us below.

Contact.subtitle: We're here to help! Choose the best way to reach us below.
Contact.customerServiceMessage: Our customer service team is here to help with any questions:

quality.title: Resolution
quality.poorDescription: The resolution of the image isn't high enough for this canvas size. If we print onto a canvas of this size, the quality of the image will be poor. Ensure the uploaded image quality is sufficient for the size you desire.

details.title: Details
details.readyToHang: Ready to hang with included hardware

qualityAssurance.title: Quality Assurance
qualityAssurance.description: We stand behind every canvas we create.

deliveryDetails.title: Delivery Details
deliveryDetails.shippingCostValue: Available at checkout (FREE shipping on orders over $150)

imageQuality.question: How do I know if my image quality is good enough?
imageQuality.answer: Our system automatically checks your image resolution and shows a quality indicator (Poor, Normal or Perfect) when you select a canvas size. We recommend 'Perfect' quality for the best results.

depthDifference.question: What's the difference between Regular and Gallery depth?
depthDifference.answer: Regular depth (0.75 inches) is our standard option, while Gallery depth (1.5 inches) creates a more dramatic, museum-like appearance with deeper sides.

localPickupAvailable.question: Do you offer local pickup?
localPickupAvailable.answer: Yes! We offer free local pickup at our Quebec City location during business hours (Monday-Friday, 9am-5pm EST). You'll receive an email when your order is ready.

satisfaction.question: What if I'm not satisfied with my canvas?
satisfaction.answer: We offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely happy with your canvas, we'll work with you to make it right or provide a full refund.

durability.question: How long will my canvas last?
durability.answer: Our canvases are printed with UVgel technology and guaranteed not to fade for over 30 years. They're also scratch and water-resistant for long-lasting beauty.

deliveryTime.question: How long does delivery take?
deliveryTime.answer: We typically need 2 - 4 days to produce, package and dispatch your canvas. Please allow additional transit time based on the shipping option you choose.

multipleCanvases.question: Can I order multiple canvases of the same image?
multipleCanvases.answer: Absolutely! You can create multiple canvas designs with different sizes and framing options from the same image.

guarantee.title: 30-Year Print Quality Guarantee
guarantee.description: We stand behind our premium UVgel printing technology with an industry-leading guarantee.

dropzone.mainText: Drop your image here, or click to browse
